author: tvami
body:
#### PR description:

This PR 
 * adds new GEM electronics map as requested in https://cms-talk.web.cern.ch/t/new-gem-electronics-mapping/10914
 * the same thing to the data GTs, thus we created new snapshotted (frozen) GTs 
 * took that chance to decouple the express and prompt tags for ECAL intercalibration as requested in https://cms-talk.web.cern.ch/t/gt-online-prompt-ecal-intercalibration-prompt-tag-for-run3/10789

This is a prerequisite of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/38062 (i.e. this has to merge first, or at the same time as 38062).

Diff of GTs:

**run2_data_relval**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts//123X_dataRun2_relval_v2/123X_dataRun2_relval_v4

**run2_data_promptlike_hi**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts//123X_dataRun2_PromptLike_HI_v2/123X_dataRun2_PromptLike_HI_v3

**run2_hlt_relval**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts//123X_dataRun2_HLT_relval_v2/123X_dataRun2_HLT_relval_v3

**run3_hlt**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts//123X_dataRun3_HLT_frozen_v2/123X_dataRun3_HLT_frozen_v5

https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts//124X_mcRun4_realistic_v2/124X_mcRun4_realistic_v4

They all contain the new GEM electronics map changes. 


Diffs for the snapshotted vs open GTs
* https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/123X_dataRun3_HLT_v9/123X_dataRun3_HLT_frozen_v4
* https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/123X_dataRun3_Express_v8/123X_dataRun3_Express_frozen_v4
* https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/123X_dataRun3_Prompt_v10/123X_dataRun3_Prompt_frozen_v4
(here the only diff is the snapshot time)


#### PR validation:
test parameters:
  - workflows = 12034.0,11634.0,7.23,159.0,12434.0,12834.0


#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Not a backport, but backport is needed in 12_3_X and 12_4_X too
title: Add new GEM electronics map to all GTs
